chapter.title: Installing syslog-ng
chapter.para: This chapter explains how to install &product; on various platforms.

listitem.para: You can install &abbrev; on many platforms using the package manager and official repositories of the platform. For a list of third-party packages available for various Linux, UNIX, and other platforms, see the &abbrev; third-party binaries page.
For instructions on compiling syslog-ng Open Source Edition from the source code, see .
You can use a syslog-ng docker image.
For detailed information on how to run your central log server in Docker and other Docker-related syslog-ng use cases, see the Logging in Docker using syslog-ng white paper.
